revised_title: Investigations on Self-Induction of an Electric Current and its Relation to the Nature and Form of the Conductor
tldr: The author investigates the self-induction of an electric current and its relation to the nature and form of the conductor. They develop a new bridge instrument to study the effects of different conductor geometries and materials on self-induction, providing insights into the behavior of electric currents in telegraph lines and other electrical systems.
